# 男人第一课

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/nanren-diyike
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/nanren-diyike
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install nanren-diyike
nanren-diyike <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g nanren-diyike
nanren-diyike <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
